TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MarkupExtensionReturnTypeAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Reports the type that a markup extension can return.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension> derived custom class should apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to indicate a possible type-safe return type that is returned by its <xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension.ProvideValue%2A> implementation. In other words, if a markup extension always returns a more specific type than type of <xref:System.Object>, and casting to that type is a primary scenario, the markup extension class should attribute with <xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtensionReturnTypeAttribute> and report that type.
In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtensionReturnTypeAttribute> is in the System.Xaml assembly. For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
For more information on patterns for implementing a custom XAML markup extension, see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension> and [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type returnType) cil managed

Docs.param: The return type that this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] reports.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A <xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension> derived custom class should apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to indicate the type-safe return type that is returned by its <xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension.ProvideValue%2A> implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type returnType, class System.Type expressionType) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The expressionType argument is not used by the XAML parser. To specify the expected return type, use MarkupExtensionReturnTypeAttribute(Type). To specify custom handling for expression types, use XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute.")

Docs.param: The return type that this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] reports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The form of <xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtensionReturnTypeAttribute> that reports a second parameter for an expression is deprecated/obsolete and should not be used. If an expression or other type or model for deferred evaluation is a possible return type, you should attribute with a return type of <xref:System.Object> instead.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This is not used by the XAML parser. Please look at XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute.")

remarks.format: ## Remarks The form of <xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtensionReturnTypeAttribute> that reports a second parameter for an expression is deprecated and should not be used. If an expression is possible, you should attribute with a return type of <xref:System.Object> instead. See <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute>.

Docs.summary: Gets the return type that this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] reports.
Docs.value: The type-safe return type of the specific implementation of the markup extension where the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is applied.
